text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue where concept is-a _SECINTOBV

This value set excludes codes based on the following rules:

  • Exclude these codes as defined in http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-ObservationValue
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    _SECINTOBVsecurity integrityAbstract security observation values used to indicate security integrity metadata.

    **Examples:** Codes conveying integrity status, integrity confidence, and provenance.
